resources.string: \u2022 Update your device and apps\n\u2022 Use two-factor authentication\n\u2022 Check if apps are from official Play Store or App Store

• Strange accounts are logged into your apps/sites
• Apps are using your location, microphone, or camera at inappropriate times
• Phone is behaving sluggishly
• Unexpected advertising or pop-ups
• Difficulty logging into secure sites
